name: Eclipse_Series_2-Seat_Reclining_Black_Leather_Theater_Seating_Unit_with_Cup_Holders
reviews: I wish I had purchase ones with a recliner that had a handle to pull out the recliner out
love the fact that it fits our space. It does seem like its going to sag soon. Will update if that happens
Wish it had a foot stool handle, other than that we like a lot
This seating unit is by far the best buy for your money comfy, looks great , real leather and delivered right to my door..great purchase.
bit heavy to carry but worth the money
description: Convert your living room into your own personal movie theater with the Eclipse Series 2-seat reclining black leather theater seating unit.
